content: *this sizzlin hot bikini is a cinch to crochet for summer beach days shown in patons grace 60604 terracotta patons yarns * materials patons® grace 50 g / 1 75 oz size a b c top 60604 terracotta 1 1 2 ball s bottom one size 60604 terracotta 2 balls *3-4 balls total for the set* size 2 25 mm u s b or 1 crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge invisible elastic thread for bottom written instructions are provided in pdf download june 2008 featured in patons july 2009 newsletter 1 1 http //www patonsyarns com/ravelry/july2009web html
